ALLOWED_DELETION_FOR_SAVED_STATUS: Only deletion is allowed for documents with SaveD status
AMOUNT_EQUALITY_CHECKS: Amount, Net amount and Tax base amount must be equal
CJ_DOC_NO_LENGTH: Cash journal document no. must be under 1-10 characters
CONTROLLING_AREA_LENGTH: Controlling area must be under 1-10 characters
DOCUMENT_STATUS_ALLOWED_VALUES: Document status must be 'Saved', 'Updated', 'Posted', 'Updated Reversed' or 'Posted Reversed'
EITHER_SUPPLIER_CUSTOMER: Either Supplier or Customer should selected
FOREIGN_KEY_ERROR: Reference error: Provided values is invalid
ORDER_NO_LENGTH: Order no must be under 1-10 characters
PASSWORD_EXPIRED_LINK: The link you followed has been expired
PASSWORD_RESET_LINK: Reset password link sent successfully to authorized email
PASSWORD_SETTING_ERROR: Error occurred: while setting the password
PASSWORD_SETTING_SUCCESS: The password has been set successfully
PASSWORD_USED_LINK: The link you followed has been used
PETTY_CASH_TYPE_EXPECTED: Petty cash type must be 'Payment' or 'Receipt'
PROFITABILITY_SEGMENT_NO_LENGTH: Profitability segment no must be under 1-10 characters
RECEIPT_RECIPIENT_LENGTH: Receipt recipient must be under 1-35 characters
REVERSE_NOT_ALLOWED: Failed: Only 'Updated' document can be reversed
REVERSE_TRANSACTION_INVALID: Something went wrong while reversing the transaction
SUB_NUMBER_LENGTH: Sub number must be under 1-10 characters
TRANSACTION_TYPE_LENGTH: Transaction type must be under 1-3 characters
USER_CREATED: User created successfully and Password link sent to authorized email
